title: Tech Takeaways: A look back at the Hokies' 74-47 win over Pitt - VT hokiesports.com
content: Tech Takeaways: A look back at the Hokies' 74-47 win over Pitt  VT hokiesports.com
description: With a impressive first-half run and another consistent shooting performance, Virginia Tech cruised to its fourth-straight win on Monday night against Pitt.
